## BlockTextureMetadata type

Block texture metadata including UVs and rendering hints.

\*\*Category:\*\* Textures

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type BlockTextureMetadata = {
    u0: number;
    v0: number;
    u1: number;
    v1: number;
    averageRGB: [number, number, number];
    isTransparent: boolean;
    needsAlphaTest: boolean;
};
```
